title: Eternia Crystal (NPC)
summaries: The Eternia Crystal is a background object that acts as the centerpiece of the Old One's Army event.

Pressing âš’ Use / Attack on the Eternia Crystal Stand with an Eternia Crystal in the player's inventory will place the Eternia Crystal on the stand. A long, flat area is required in order to place the Eternia Crystal successfully and summon the event; otherwise, the Eternia Crystal will not be placed. Once this is done, two Mysterious Portals will appear far away from either side of the Eternia Crystal, and, after a 5-second countdown, the Eternia Crystal (now considered an NPC) must be protected from waves of enemies from the Old One's Army who will prioritize attacking it. If the Crystal is destroyed, the event ends in failure. If it is kept "alive" until all waves are cleared, the event is won.
The Eternia Crystal can be purchased from the Tavernkeep for 25 SC (pre-any mechanical boss) / 1 GC (post-any mechanical boss) / 4 GC (post-Golem).
